name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior QA Engineer with 8 years of full-stack development experience, I excel in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Node.js**, and have a strong foundation in **CI/CD** processes and **test automation**. My extensive background includes implementing comprehensive **regression testing** and **end-to-end testing** strategies, ensuring robust quality assurance protocols. I have effectively communicated with cross-functional teams to align development goals and maintain high standards of output.

I have successfully led the deployment of high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing my expertise in **FastAPI**, **Django**, and cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS**. My knowledge of microservices architecture and event-driven systems has allowed me to develop compliant and secure solutions, adhering to HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Additionally, I am experienced in leveraging **AI/ML** capabilities to enhance applications and streamline workflows using tools such as MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow.
